maxDiceCount.name: Maximum dice thrown:
maxDiceCount.hint: Largest number of dice you can throw in the Simple Dice Roller. Minimum: 1. Maximum: 30.

enableFirstColumn.name: Add additional 1st column for 1 die
enableFirstColumn.hint: Note: the dice-icon column is always clickable similar to other online tabletop platfroms.

enableCoins.name: Enable coin tosses
enableCoins.hint: For making coin flips (similar to D2 dice rolls).

enableFudgeDice.name: Enable 'Fudge Dice'
enableFudgeDice.hint: For rolling 'Fudge Dice' (a.k.a. 'Fate Dice') for your Fate and Fudge games.

enableSpecialDiceButtons.name: Enable Special Dice Button(s)
enableSpecialDiceButtons.hint: Adds control button option(s) for Exploding dice on the highest roll. Unusable with coin flips, Fudge Dice and d100!
